com.romanostrechlis.rssnews.auxiliary

Class Helper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.romanostrechlis.rssnews.auxiliary.Helper

  • public class Helper
extends Object
    Provides static methods for the application

    Methods Implemented

    • #addItemFeed(RssFeed): add a new RssFeed to the database.
    • readRSS(DatabaseHandler, AssetManager): gets a list of all RssFeed objects with enabled equal to true.
    • readRSSAll(DatabaseHandler): gets a list with all RssFeed objects in database.
    • downloadContent(DatabaseHandler): downloads the content from the web and parse it into RssItem objects.
    • isConnected(Activity): checks whether application has Internet connection.
    TODO: Replace all uses of this class before publishing your app.
    Author:
    Romanos Trechlis

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        private static void addItem(RssFeed item)
        Auto-generated code.

      • readRSS

        public static void readRSS(DatabaseHandler db,
           AssetManager assetManager)
        Checks if database is populated, if it is gets all enabled RssFeed objects, else it opens the rssfeeds.txt file from assets and populates the database itself.

        Calls addItem(RssFeed) which appends objects to the static ITEMS and ITEM_MAP. Used by NodeListActivity

        Parameters:
        db -
        assetManager -

      • readRSSAll

        public static void readRSSAll(DatabaseHandler db)
        Gets all RssFeed objects from database and populates ITEMS_TOTAL and ITEM_MAP_TOTAL.

        Used by ManageActivity.

        Parameters:
        db -

      • addItemFeed

        public static Boolean addItemFeed(DatabaseHandler db,
                  RssFeed mFeed)
        Adds an RssItem to database.
        Parameters:
        item - rss feed item with the relevant information.
        Returns:
        true if successfully adds the rss feed.

      • isConnected
